version_description: - This version includes user experience enhancements, security updates, and more.
This version includes login enhancements, security updates, and more.

This version includes:
· Landing page enhancements
· Account reordering for users with a large number of accounts
· Tap-to-call phone numbers
· Bug fixes
· And more

This version includes several enhancements and performance improvements
•External Transfers on mobile
oEnroll and manage external accounts
oCreate one-time and recurring transfers
•Mobile payment enhancements*
oTo Do List – Notifications for upcoming bills due
oAdding payees in the app
oPayment activity – see recent payment history
•iPhone X facial recognition support – Please use TouchID prompts to set up facial recognition in the app

Visit FHB.com to learn more.
*Requires Bill Pay enrollment, additional charges may apply. See FHB Online Terms and Conditions for details.
This version includes accounts page enhancements, bug fixes, and more.

This version includes a refreshed user experience, usability improvements, accessibility improvements, bug fixes and more.

This version includes a new iPad user experience, mobile deposit improvements, overall usability enhancements, bug fixes and more. If you previously used our ‘FHB Mobile for iPad’ app, please delete it and download this version to experience the latest features.
